title: The Cutest Height Difference - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Body Swap   Cowardly Protagonist   Cute Story   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Short Story   Timid Protagonist
author: Carbonic Acid   Tan Suan   碳酸
description:
Timid and fearful shou + overbearing and black-bellied gong.

The black-bellied gong is one metre eighty-six, the fearful shou is one metre sixty-eight.

One day, the world flipped over and the fearful shou and black-bellied gong exchanged bodies.

The two gathered together at a small restaurant.

The black-bellied gong complimented with a face of satisfaction: You are quite pretty.

Your body is pale.

You feel good to touch……

The fearful shou looked alarmed: You- you- what have you done to my body?!

Black-bellied gong: Nothing much.

The fearful shou lamented: When will we get our bodies back?

Black-bellied gong: Get what back? I still haven’t used it enough!>
